name: Grand Touring
description:
Slip into a flame-proof racing suit, pull on your driving gloves and buckle up for a sensational, power sliding, rubber burning, ride of a lifetime. Grand Touring's unique AI system pits you against real thinking opponents in an arcade-quality motor-racing simulation that boasts the fastest, most beautiful PC graphics technology on the planet.

Featuring over 20 cars including all the major production race car categories and some of the world's fastest road cars, Grand Touring is the ultimate mix of motor-racing intelligence and adrenaline.
